parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240015), which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda, as it's a mandatory identifier for campaign materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "Elena Lasconi" and promotes her candidacy for President.  While the image shows two USR candidates, the text focuses on Elena Lasconi and her position on the ballot. This directly refers to a candidate participating in the elections, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, this message is clearly intended for a wide audience, not just personal communication. Facebook's public nature ensures broad reach, satisfying "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to vote for Elena Lasconi and the USR party. The call to action ("Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi!") explicitly aims to influence voting behavior, thus fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's a clear endorsement, not an informative piece. It doesn't present different viewpoints or provide balanced information.  It's purely promotional.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>This is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, presented as an advertisement.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>875948338037913</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Elena Lasconi), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to support her candidacy. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's content is promotional, not journalistic.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Elena Lasconi</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
USR Maramureș, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 875948338037913), după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu mesajul "Votează USR! Votează echipa Elena Lasconi! Poziția 6 pe buletinul de vot.",  având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea candidatei Elena Lasconi și a partidului USR.  Reclama, care conține numărul CMF 11240015, se încadrează în definiția materialului de propagandă electorală conform art. 36 (7) din Legea nr. 334/2006, depășind limitele jurnalismului și având ca scop explicit influențarea votului.  Cheltuielile de publicitate se situează între 100 și 199 RON, cu o estimare a audienței de 100.000 - 500.000 persoane, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Datele de contact ale USR Maramureș sunt disponibile la comunicare@usr.ro și +40743564061.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
